conversation.message: I am writing to formally express my deep interest in joining Company_D. Your mission aligns perfectly with my professional goals, and I believe my skills are an excellent fit for your team. I consider Company_D my top choice.

Since securing my top preference (Company_D) is possible in this round, I should make a formal application immediately.
